catalog.title: Dinosaur Collection
catalog.subtitle: Explore our complete collection of dinosaur species with detailed information about each one.

noResults.title: No dinosaurs found
noResults.subtitle: Try adjusting your search criteria or clearing the filters.

notFound.title: Species Not Found
notFound.message: We couldn't find the dinosaur species you're looking for.

diet.title: Diet & Feeding
diet.carnivore: This dinosaur was a carnivore, feeding primarily on meat from other animals. It likely used its sharp teeth and powerful jaws to hunt and consume prey.
diet.herbivore: This dinosaur was a herbivore, feeding exclusively on plants. It had specialized teeth and digestive systems adapted for processing plant material.
diet.omnivore: This dinosaur was an omnivore, with a varied diet including both plants and meat. This flexibility likely gave it advantages in different environments.

anatomy.title: Anatomy & Appearance
anatomy.description: Detailed anatomical information about this dinosaur species.

ecology.noBehaviorInfo: No specific behavior information available for this species.

relatedSpecies.title: Discover More Species
relatedSpecies.description: Explore our complete collection of dinosaur species and learn about their fascinating world.

gallery.title: Image Gallery
gallery.description: Visual representations, reconstructions, and fossil evidence of this dinosaur species.
gallery.noImages: No images available for this species

discover.title: Discover Dinosaurs
discover.subtitle: Explore fascinating themes and discover dinosaurs grouped by their most remarkable characteristics.

giants.title: Giants
giants.description: The largest dinosaurs that ever walked the Earth. Massive sauropods and other colossal creatures.

predators.title: Predators
predators.description: Fast and deadly carnivores. The most fearsome hunters of the prehistoric world.

brazil.title: From Brazil
brazil.description: Dinosaurs discovered in Brazil. Unique species from South American fossil sites.

armored.title: Armored
armored.description: Heavily defended dinosaurs with armor, spikes, and horns for protection.

rare.title: Rare Finds
rare.description: Recently discovered or exceptionally rare dinosaur species with unique characteristics.

aerial.title: Sky Rulers
aerial.description: Flying reptiles and dinosaurs that ruled the prehistoric skies.
